description:
Lullaby turned out to be a flute used for mass-murder curse magic, killing anyone who heard its melody!  "Shinigami" Erigor and his dark guild Eisenwald take over Oshibana station, and announces to Erza and the others who came to stop him that he would play the flute to all the people in the area. Erigor leaves to put his plan into action, and the battle begins right away with Erza taking the lead... But it seems like Erigor has some other goal in mind...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fairy Tail, au coeur de la tempête
